source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Draw Your Own Dragons
items.headline: Learn how to draw all kinds of dragons by using simple step by step techniques in this drawing course!
objectives_summary: How to Draw Dragons
How to Merge Lizard and Bird Anatomy
Scales, Wings, Feet, Heads, Horns, Spikes, Frills and Tails!

items.title: Madhubani/Mithila Painting: Indian folk: Intermediate Level
items.headline: Various motives of Madhubani Painting flower, leaves, trees, animals, birds, borders and basic shapes of mithila artwork
objectives_summary: madhubani painting
Mithila Painting
Madhubani Art

items.title: Colour Mixing for Abstract Painting
items.headline: A beginners guide to colour mixing
objectives_summary: How to do basic colour mixing
How to use a colour wheel
How to identify primary, secondary and tertiary colours

items.title: The Ultimate Acting Course: Learn to Act With a Pro

visible_instructors.name: Lucy
visible_instructors.title: Lucy Aarden
visible_instructors.job_title: Game of Thrones actress and acting coach

items.headline: Advance Your Acting Technique To Increase Your Growth As An Actor
objectives_summary: Tips from behind the scenes on set to increase your acting skill
Steps to advance your acting technique
How to unleash the power of your imagination

items.title: Give A Second Life To Old Furniture With Restoration Tips
items.headline: How to restore old furniture and give it new economic value
objectives_summary: Recognize the different kinds of varnish
Use the most appropriate technique to remove varnish according to the furniture
Improve not only old furniture but also new pieces you might own and be bored of: you can give them a new life by changing their look, working on color and varnish

items.title: Painting Sweet Treats with Watercolor
items.headline: Watercolor Practice
objectives_summary: In this class you will find easy to follow step by step videos of painting a donut, ice cream and french macarons.  And along the way you will:
1. Learn and practice new techniques
2. Apply various watercolor techniques in a painting

items.title: Draw a Cottage with Watercolor Pencils & Pen and Ink
items.headline: Ideal for beginners. Learn how to use pen and ink then colour using Watercolor Pencils and apply a wash.
objectives_summary: How To Use Watercolour Pencils dry to colour a cottage
How to use pen and ink to create a bold drawing
How to apply a watercolour wash over the pencils

items.title: Plein Air Landscape Painting: Outdoor Study to Studio

visible_instructors.name: Michael Chesley
visible_instructors.title: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC
visible_instructors.display_name: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC

items.headline: Take Your Painting to the Next Level by Heading to the Studio
objectives_summary: Gather the appropriate reference material in the field (drawings, color studies, photographs)
Organize the reference material in a meaningful way for studio work
Successfully create a painting based on the reference material

items.title: Drawing with Makeup: A Face Chart Tutorial
items.headline: How to Make a Beauty Illustration Step-by-Step
objectives_summary: create a portrait consisting of a beautiful face chart, using your makeup products and brushes
confidently design and illustrate makeup looks
draw realistic looking eyebrows

items.title: Bag Making with Natural Fibers: Learn From Scratch
items.headline: Learn Quickly and Easily to Create Shoulder-strap Bags, Purses, Handbags, and Backpacks by Weaving with Vegetable Fibers
objectives_summary: Learn from scratch how to make bags with natural fibers.
Become a bag making master by learning how to weave shoulder-strap bags, handbags, and backpacks.

You'll acquire, at a very low price, unique knowledge about natural artisan weaving. You will not find this knowledge in any other course. At the end of this class, you'll be able to create amazing projects for yourself, for friends and family, and even to earn some extra money.

items.title: Oil Pastel Paintings with free Sketching Course
items.headline: Advanced Course  for Beginners
objectives_summary: You will learn how to paint with Oil Pastels

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 4: Drawing the Full Figure (P1)
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will start by learning the basic structure of the full figures
How to draw feet
How to draw garments of Christ, Apostles and Prophets

items.title: Pen & Ink Drawing for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Anne
visible_instructors.title: Anne Edwards
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artst - MA Royal College of Art London

items.headline: Pen & Ink Drawing made easy with step by step instructions for you to follow.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to use Pen & Ink with confidence
In this course you will learn basic Drawing principles
By the end of this course your observational capacity will be enhanced

items.title: How to Paint Koi
items.headline: Watercolor and acrylic painting techniques
objectives_summary: How to paint Koi fish using watercolor and acrylic
Apply techniques to improve composition
Steps to market your art and earn extra income

items.title: Basics in Drawing and Sketching
items.headline: Learn the elements of art, drawing techniques and more to lay a good foundation for your drawing and sketching ability!
objectives_summary: You will be able to improve your observation through simple exercises and assignments.
You will be able to develop your own creative process and draw or sketch with more confidence.
Using all concepts of the program together, you will be able to create illusions of complex objects or landscapes on paper.

items.title: How to Draw Lips - Figure Drawing Anatomy Course
items.headline: Learning to Draw the Head I Face for Beginners The Easy Way I Human body
objectives_summary: How to Draw Lips
How to Draw
How to draw people
